name: Social Share Love
author: noucktourno

sections.description:
Social Share Love plugin for WordPress adds a list of XHTML compliant graphic links at the end of your posts or pages that allow your visitors to easily submit them on most important social bookmarking sites.
Also, for easy configuration, the Social Share Love plugin adds a page in the WordPress admin section that lets you customize it.

Social Share Love support the following social bookmarking networks: delicious, digg, facebook, friendfeed, google, myster-wong, myspace, reddit, slashdot, stumbleupon, technorati, twitter and yahoo.

We would like to thank the kind and generous folks at pariuri sportive for their donation that allows us to make the Social Share Love wordpress plugin.

If you like this plugin please rate it.

Configuration

Access the configuration page from your wordpress dashboard and change the text that is displayed on your blog. Select the desired social network links you want to display, then save the configuration and test it.

Other

If you would like to submit an useful social network which is not included in Social Share Love plugin, send me the social network link for submition e.g. domain.com/submit?url={link}&title={title}.

Email: socialsharelove@gmail.com

This plugin is based on GNU GPL plugins Social Bookmarks 3.2 and Social Bookmarking Reloaded 3.09.
sections.installation: Extract the archive file (.zip) and upload the folder social-share-love in wp-content/plugins of your web hosting. Then activate the plugin through the plugin menu of admin control panel.
sections.faq: Feel free to ask your questions through email at socialsharelove@gmail.com

short_description: Social Share Love plugin enables your blog readers to share articles on most important social bookmarking networks like Yahoo, Google, Facebook, etc.

screenshots.caption: The icons added at the end of a post/page.
